text: Disney's Aladdin Junior (Aladdin Jr.) is a musical. It is based on the 1992 Disney animated movie, Aladdin. The music was written by Alan Menken. The lyrics were written by Howard Ashman and Tim Rice. The musical is written to be performed by child actors. It is one of the musicals in the Broadway Junior series by Music Theatre International. ==Other websites== *Disney's Aladdin Jr at Broadwayjr.com Category:Broadway musicals Category:Musicals based on fairy tales Category:Musicals based on movies Category:Musicals by Tim Rice
title: Disney's Aladdin Junior
